mapper.insert: insert into comment_db(articleId, writerId, content, writtenDate, parentCommentId, distance, step) values(#{articleId}, #{writerId}, #{content}, #{writtenDate}, #{parentCommentId}, #{distance}, #{step})
mapper.update: update comment_db set articleId = #{articleId}, writerId = #{writerId}, content = #{content}, writtenDate = #{writtenDate}, parentCommentId = #{parentCommentId}, distance = #{distance}, step = #{step} where commentId = #{commentId}
